alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 5:46PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect western Geauga...east central Cuyahoga and southwestern Lake Counties Until 645 PM EST.... At 545 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band over Mentor, or near Painesville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations that may be impacted include...Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Mentor, Solon, Willoughby, Eastlake, South Russell, Timberlake, Lakeline, Chesterland, Mayfield Heights, Lyndhurst, Wickliffe, Willoughby Hills, Highland Heights, Mentor-On- The-Lake, Kirtland and Pepper Pike. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 314, 315, 320, 326, 330, and 331.
